answers.text:
Kim:
Attached are descriptions for all five forms of local government, including both town meeting and representative town meeting.  You can retrieve this documentation and numerous other pertaining to form of government through the Council-Manager Form Resource Package (icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/topics/kn/Topic/64/CouncilManager_Form_of_Government).
If you have any further questions, please feel free to contact me.
--Jared
